item.title: The Red Bell’s Lament launches June 5
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/03/the-red-bells-lament-launches-june-5

■ About

The Red Bell’s Lament is a dark fantasy epic spanning two realms: the human world and domain of vampires. Following a band of lone-wolf vampire hunters who unite to fight for the fate of their world, this marks the second console game from the company. This title will be the first released under new brand AmuLit, formed in September 2024, and has already attracted tons of attention from fans around the world.

More than just another love story—something Voltage Inc. is renowned for—this title offers a dramatic, thought-provoking narrative, breathtaking visuals, and compelling performances, all brought to you by the talented writers, artists, and cast.

■ Story

The Redbell Tree scrapes the sky, standing proudly in the heart of Hemeria, a land of sunlight. In a land ruled by a monarchy for generations, humans lived in peace and tranquility. That is, until the dawn of the day the world was dyed red.

On that day, vampires laid waste to Hemeria. They preyed on, devoured, and devastated its inhabitants. A great many people would go on to mourn their loved ones, their families and friends, for the rest of their lives. One particular town of Hemeria bore such a tragedy. A single girl was left alone in despair and disgrace. She vowed revenge, and grew into one of Hemeria’s finest vampire hunters.

And one day, she became a member of the Elpis 7; those who inspired a light of hope in its people.

One day, she receives a letter from an unknown sender. Upon her arrival to the mansion indicated inside, she finds vampire hunters and a royal knight awaiting her. The hunters assembled receive an order from the monarch.

They are to form a squad and invade Nyx, the world of vampires. A shiver of anticipation crackles through her at the opportunity she’s been waiting for her whole life. However, this is but the beginning of a game wherein the fate of her world is at stake. Pawns are sent forth, discarded, hidden out of sight…

And just how many will remain when this all comes to an end?

■ Main Characters

Juliet Rose (name customizable)

She who hunts for Revenge.

An elite vampire hunter and member of the Elpis 7. After her brother, her only living relative, was killed by a vampire, she swore revenge and devoted her life to that of a vampire hunter. Rather than let her hatred consume her, she fights with beauty and strength, which has led to her popularity as a savior of the people.

She is just as formidable off of the battlefield, and when challenged to games by the residents of Hemeria, she isn’t above cheating to get her way.

The news of the discovery of an entrance to Nyx, the world of the vampires, stokes a flame within her, and she dives head first into a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to seek revenge.

Ciaran Lowell (voiced by Takuya Eguchi)

He who hunts for Power.

Even among the elite vampire hunters that make up the Elpis 7, he is lauded as the strongest. There are whispers that he defeated an aristos vampire at the age of ten.

Preferring solitude and isolation, he rarely mixes with others. However, he thinks favorably of those in pursuit of strength, and will at times cooperate with the heroine. He takes pride in his own strength, honed by his daily training, but he is pragmatic and will not engage in reckless battle.

When summoned by the kingdom to join the invasion of Nyx, he is the one whose intentions most closely mirror the heroine’s. He is their trump card.

Garrett Welkin (voiced by Daisuke Namikaa)

He who hunts under Order.

The hero of Hemeria, promoted to Commander of the Royal Order at a young age.

The reason behind his ascension to Commander at such a young age is due to the large scale vampire assault he faced in his youth. Many of his fellow trainees lost their lives, but he was the sole survivor, saving the lives of many citizens, and hailed as a hero.

He is the public’s brightest hope against their fear of vampires.

Although he has a serious and stubborn side, and claims to hate vampire hunters, he appears before the heroine as the commander of the hunt party.

Asher Thompson (voiced by Nobuhiko Okamoto)

He who hunts to Live.

A childhood friend of the heroine, with a bright and gentle personality. After an abrupt disappearance he eventually returns, having made a name for himself as one of the Elpis 7.

Both of his parents, the Thompsons, serve as both vampire hunters and mentors towards the heroine.

He’s a ray of sunshine amongst the otherwise dour members of the squad, but unlike the Asher the heroine knew in her youth, there’s an air of mystery about him.

His sunny disposition is the foundation of the trust between the hunters, with the hope his light will cut through the darkness of Nyx.

Rhodes Heartfield (voiced by Kengo Kawanishi)

He who raids for Pride.

An elegant and beautiful aristos vampire. An immortal being with a preference for human blood and manipulator of magic.

Cloaked in the fragrance of flowers, he seduces his victims with his soft smile and sweet words. He conceals his true identity from the heroine, sneaking into the crevices of her heart to compel her to do his bidding.

Does he wish to prey on humans, or does he despise them? His true intentions are unknown.

  • PC

Fierce dodgeball games featuring Double Dragon characters.

Publisher Arc System Works and developer Yuke’s have released a new trailer for Double Dragon Revive introducing the pre-order bonus game Double Dragon Dodgeball.

The game features a total of 56 characters from the Double Dragon series who will participate in fierce dodgeball matches. Game modes include Story Mode, which is a classic Marian rescue story, a two-player Versus Mode, and a Survival Mode for up to four players.

Double Dragon Revive is due out for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, and PC via Steam on October 23.

item.title: SNES – Nintendo Switch Online adds Nobunaga’s Ambition, Nobunaga’s Ambition: Lord of Darkness, Romance of the Three Kingdoms IV: Wall of Fire, and Unc
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/03/snes-nintendo-switch-online-adds-nobunagas-ambition-nobunagas-ambition-lord-of-darkness-romance-of-the-three-kingdoms-iv-wall-of-fire-and-uncharted-waters-new-horizons-on-march-28

Nobunaga’s Ambition, Nobunaga’s Ambition: Lord of Darkness, Romance of the Three Kingdoms IV: Wall of Fire, and Uncharted Waters: New Horizons will join the Super Nintendo Entertainment System – Nintendo Switch Online lineup on March 28, Nintendo announced.

■ Nobunaga’s Ambition

About

Be ruthless—your rivals will be!

Oda Nobunaga, the mighty leader who strove to unite war-torn Japan, has returned, with more strength, intellect and luck on his side than ever before. Now as Oda, it’s your turn to fight for control of Japan in this, the improved version of Koei’s popular Nintendo Entertainment System game, Nobunaga’s Ambition.

No one can be trusted in 16th century Japan—warlords hungry for power, ninja spies on terrorist missions, and rebellious peasants right in your own backyard will strike the first chance they get. But you’re pretty tough yours in a lean and mean fighting force, the latest in modern rifle and a cool head to deal win pressure.

After 100 years of chaos, the people of Japan are desperate for peace and order. Will you be the one to end the destruction?

Key Features

  • Unite the lands of Japan.
  • Play Lord Nobunaga or one of 50 other famous Japanese warlords out to stop him.
  • Meet the challenge in four scenarios for one-to-eight players.
  • Supports the Super Nintendo Entertainment System mouse.

■ Nobunaga’s Ambition: Lord of Darkness

About

Introducing a new kind of troublemaker!

Lord Nobunaga is out to take control of Japan and along the way he plans on making lots of trouble for those around him.

As a young daimyo with your own ambitions, here’s your chance to plot strategies that will get you past Lord Nobunaga and the obstacles he has in store for you. In preparation, surround yourself with strong generals, strengthen your territories through new technologies and supply your armies with the latest in rifles.

And remember: don’t let your upcoming battle delay you in keeping your citizenry well fed, your warriors versed in tea ceremonies and your messengers prepared to make alliances with neighboring states. When the inevitable confrontation comes, Lord Nobunaga will use a variety of military tactics including; joint attacks, day and night battles, castle sieges and ninja infiltrations.

Stay on your toes and prepare for anything? When Lord Nobunaga’s in the picture, bad things tend to happen!

Key Features

  • As daimyo, surround yourself with the strongest of 300 generals.
  • Battle your enemies on the open plains, at sea or within castle walls.
  • Improve your territories strength through new technologies, castle defenses, and gold mines.
  • Raise the loyalty of your generals by obtaining over 30 different tea items.
  • One-to-eight-player fun.

■ Romance of the Three Kingdoms IV: Wall of Fire

About

Prepare to be romanced!

It’s the Second Han Dynasty and China is on the verge of collapse. Infighting among the court families and the emergence of pow-erful warlords dominates the landscape. The struggle for power has brought an era known as the Three Kingdoms, complete with constant warfare among China’s most courageous and skillful heroes.

As a ruler during these difficult times, it’s up to you to unify a country torn apart by rebellion. Expand your kingdom by building a strong military or try outsmarting your rivals during negotiations. With exciting new weapons including automatic firing crossbows and catapults you can engage your opponents out in the open or from behind castle walls. But don’t forget, a ruler’s strength is also measured by the economic power of his kingdom and the happiness of its people!

Good luck in your quest to unite China!

Key Features

  • Discuss war strategy with up to 558 different officers.
  • Defeat your enemy using powerful new weapons including automatic firing crossbows, battering rams, and catapults.
  • Play one of 38 exciting rulers, eight of whom you can create yourself.
  • Set your enemies units, ships or cities ablaze using new fire commands.
  • Challenge your enemies to a castle, open plains or river duel atop horseback.

■ Uncharted Waters: New Horizons

About

The ultimate role-playing adventure!

Imagine a time when mighty navies controlled the seven seas, ruthless pirates searched for hidden treasures and scholars argued that the Earth was round. Now, picture yourself as a young explorer on a mission that will carry you to the four comers of the globe.

Play the son of a Portuguese Duke out to discover the legendary land of Atlantis, a Spanish female navy lieutenant turned pirate, a British privateer commissioned by Henry VIII to destroy the Spanish fleet, an Italian adventurer in debt from his father or a Turkish orphan starting his own trading business.

Your adventure will take you to over 130 exotic destinations. Along the way, you will discover exotic monuments, long sought treasures and valuable merchandise to trade. As captain of your fleet, keep a careful eye on the horizon for pirates eager to steal your valued cargo or an enemy navy at war with the flag your ship flies. Once in port, remember to recruit mates, purchase new ships and gunnery, gather useful information and settle disputes with your enemies by challenging them to a duel.

Get ready for the adventure of a lifetime!

Key Features

  • Play one of six ambitious young heroes, each with their own scenario.
  • Seek out more than 180 treasures, including rare animals and exotic monuments.
  • Organize a powerful fleet with up to as different types of historical ships.
  • While in port, explore the guild, bank, fortune-teller, and Round Earth Society.
  • One-player adventure.

item.title: NEIGHBORS: Suburban Warfare launches in Early Access on April 17
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/03/neighbors-suburban-warfare-launches-in-early-access-on-april-17

  • PC

Playtest now available.

Team-based player-versus-player game NEIGHBORS: Suburban Warfare will launch in Early Access for PC via Steam on April 17, developer Invisible Walls announced. A playtest is available now.

The Early Access version will include the main game mode playable in two different maps, eight playable characters with perk progression and a level cap of 20, and a selection of five houses playable in both maps. This will be expanded upon continuously throughout Early Access, which is expected to last for about one year.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

NEIGHBORS: Suburban Warfare is a lighthearted, team-based player-versus-player game about neighborhood warfare! Deploy traps and barricades to defend your own house and open your shed to chose crazy tools to get the better of your Neighbors. If you are sneaky you can even steal their deed!

Welcome to the Neighborhood

“Love thy neighbor.” Or so the saying goes at least. Well. On some days that might just not be what you want to do at all. Prepare, gear up and vandalize your way through your neighbors defenses to get the better of them.

NEIGHBORS: Suburban Warfare is a lighthearted team-based multiplayer game for up to eight players that features a wide range of items, abilities and base-building. All set in the lovely neighborhoods in the grand city of Heartsville.

Meet the Neighbors

Heartsville is the home of many unique neighbors for you to meet and play as. From the old cheerful Doreen to the little annoying brat that is Kevin, there is sure to be a neighbor you can relate to.

As the seasons come and go, more neighbors will move into the neighborhoods of Heartsville.

  • Play as eight unique neighbors with more to come.
  • Each neighbor starts with their own unique item and ability.
  • Unlock new hobbies and perks as you play.

Prepare Your House

It is always a good idea to be prepared for intruders. Strategize, purchase and fortify your house with a wide range of utility and traps. Don’t forget to tend to the garden where you can plant all kinds of fruits and vegetables to aid you in the battle.

  • Place traps in clever ways and fortify your perimeter.
  • Expands on your garden and house with new additions.
  • Gear up for the offensive.

Attack Your Neighbor

While a good defense will come in handy, you know what they say: The best defense is a good offense. In NEIGHBORS: Suburban Warfare there are several ways to victory and neighborhood glory. It is up to you if you want to take the sneaky path or go in loud with a bang.

However, no matter which path you choose you need to be clever about how to use the tools at hand.

  • Endless combinations of both ranged and melee tactics available.

A Growing City

Enjoy a stroll down the harmonious Harmony Lane or the serene Serenity Summit. As time goes by more Neighborhoods will be opened up in Heartsville for you to brawl it out in. However, no matter which neighborhood you end up playing in, choosing your house will be critical.

In NEIGHBORS: Suburban Warfare your home is your battleground. Choose between different houses and, with time, customize them to stand out among your neighbors.

  • Five different houses to play in with more added regularly.

We are hard at work at the Heartsvile Event Calendar, so please check back in soon to see the upcoming events and updates. We wish you a pleasant stay!

Watch a new trailer below.

item.title: Underwater psychological horror game Dark Mass announced for PS5, Xbox Series, and PC
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/03/underwater-psychological-horror-game-dark-mass-announced-for-ps5-xbox-series-and-pc

  • PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

Set entirely in a fully submerged underwater manor.

Insomnis developer Path Games has announced Dark Mass, a psychological horror game set entirely in a fully submerged underwater manor. It will launch for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam in fall 2026.

Here is an overview of the game, via Path Games:

About

A haunted past buried beneath the waves

In Dark Mass, players take on the role of Alice, a deep-sea explorer who, alongside her brother Reed, stumbles upon the wreckage of an ancient ship. But beneath it lies something far more sinister—a manor lost to time, eerily untouched despite spending centuries in the abyss.

As Alice ventures inside, she soon realizes she is not alone. Something watches from the darkness. Trapped within the manor’s decaying halls, she must unravel the mysteries of its past, solve dark ritualistic puzzles, and face the horrifying truth that binds her to this place.

With fully voiced dialogue, immersive underwater physics, and a haunting narrative, Dark Mass promises a terrifying descent into the unknown, where every choice matters and survival is anything but guaranteed.

  • ❮
  • ❯

Key Features

  • The First Fully Underwater Horror Experience – Explore a sunken manor, where movement is affected by the deep-sea environment, adding a unique layer of tension and immersion.
  • A Narrative-Driven Psychological Horror – Communicate with your brother Reed through a fully voiced walkie-talkie system as you uncover the chilling truth behind the manor’s curse.
  • Disturbing Ritual Puzzles – Solve unique challenges inspired by historical inquisitorial tortures, unlocking the manor’s darkest secrets.
  • A Relentless Presence Stalks You – Evade Silas, a monstrous entity bound to the manor for centuries, waiting for its next victim.
  • Decisions That Shape Your Fate – Your actions determine how Alice’s story unfolds, leading to different endings.

Playtime

Four to six hours.

Watch the announcement trailer below. View the first screenshots at the gallery.
